Languages.string: understands Elvish and Umbral but can't speak

MonsterTrait.Name: Blood Scent
MonsterTrait.Text: A hound of the night can follow a scent through phase shifts, ethereal movement, dimension door, and fey steps of any kind. Teleport and plane shift are beyond their ability to follow.

MonsterTrait.Name: Innate Spellcasting
MonsterTrait.Text: The hound's innate spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save DC 13). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components: At will: dimension door

MonsterAction.Name: Bite
MonsterAction.Text: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 21 (3d10 + 5) piercing damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 15 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

MonsterTrait.Name: Frost Breath (Recharge 5-6)
MonsterTrait.Text: The hound exhales a 15-foot cone of frost. Those in the area of effect take 44 (8d10) cold damage, or half damage with a successful DC 13 Dexterity saving throw.
